statements.name: PROC GOPTIONS
statements.description: Lists the graphics options, and their values and descriptions in the Log tab. Can also list the currently defined global statements. By default, each listed item is displayed on a separate line.

arguments.name: AXIS
arguments.description: requests a list of all current AXIS definitions.

arguments.name: CENTIMETERS
arguments.description: displays the values of the HORIGIN=, HSIZE=, PAPERFEED=, PAPERLIMIT=, VORIGIN=, and VSIZE= graphics options in units of centimeters (CM).

arguments.name: FOOTNOTE
arguments.description: requests a list of all of the current FOOTNOTE and TITLE definitions.

arguments.name: LEGEND
arguments.description: requests a list of all of the current LEGEND definitions.

arguments.name: NOLIST
arguments.description: suppresses the display of graphics options.

arguments.name: NOLOG
arguments.description: displays the output in the Results tab instead of the Log tab.

arguments.name: OPTION=
arguments.description: requests information about the specified graphics option.

arguments.name: PATTERN
arguments.description: requests a list of all of the current PATTERN definitions.

arguments.name: SHORT
arguments.description: suppresses the descriptions of the graphics options and displays the graphics options values in an alphabetical list in paragraph form.

arguments.name: SYMBOL
arguments.description: requests a list of all of the current SYMBOL definitions.

arguments.name: TITLE
arguments.description: requests a list of all of the current TITLE and FOOTNOTE definitions.
